dcterms:creator: Yang Gao
Steffen Eger
Ilia Kuznetsov
Iryna Gurevych
Yusuke Miyao
dcterms:description: The ACL-2018 dataset includes reviews and acceptance labels for 1538 submissions from 21 tracks. It contains anonymous referee identifiers and provides a structured peer review data set for evaluating paper quality.
dcterms:title: ACL-2018 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Saif M. Mohammad
dcterms:description: The NLPScholar dataset provides citation counts for papers in the field of Natural Language Processing, allowing for the analysis of citation trends and paper impact.
dcterms:title: NLPScholar dataset

dcterms:creator: Xinyu Hua
Mitko Nikolov
Nikhil Badugu
Lu Wang
dcterms:description: The AMPERE dataset contains annotated computer science reviews with sentence-level discourse labels, facilitating the study of argumentation in peer reviews.
dcterms:title: AMPERE dataset
